validation.password-length: Password must have at least 8 characters.

sign-in-up.sign-up-description: Sign up now to download Semanux, change your plan, and edit settings. The Semanux account is free.
sign-in-up.newsletter: I want to subscribe to the newsletter

reset-password-request.message: We have sent a mail to {email} with instructions how to reset your password. You can leave this page now.

reset-password-requested.message: Request reset of password has been sent to your e-mail address. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions. You can leave this page now.

reset-password.title: Reset password
reset-password.success: Password successfully set, thank you! You can leave this page now.
reset-password.request-token: Your request seems to be outdated. Click here to renew it.

download.message: The download of Semanux should start automatically within a second. If the download does not start, {link}. After the download you can leave this page.

not-found.title: Page not found
not-found.message: We could not find the requested page.
